package:
Rock task for the ORB-SLAM2 implemented by Raul Mur-Artal (Uni. Zaragoza - Spain). ORB-SLAM2 is a real-time SLAM library for Monocular, Stereo and RGB-D cameras that computes the camera trajectory and a sparse 3D reconstruction.
Javier Hidalgo Carrio/javier.hidalgo_carrio@dfki.de GPLv3 https://github.com/raulmur/ORB_SLAM2
stabletags>
